column2: Last year’s stock market blowout is apt to prove “a dangerous blessing” for many ordinary retirement plan savers, Liberum chief market strategist Joachim Klement warns. Thanks to the boom in the S&P 500 (SPX) and the fall in the bond market (BX:TMUBMUSD10Y) many are now taking on far more risk in their portfolio than they intended, can handle, or may even realize, he warns. “Stock markets in the United States, the U.K., and Europe were up more than 20% in 2021, private equity was up more than 70% (at least in the listed space) and real estate was up more than 20% globally as well,” London-based Klement points out.
